models_evaluated.notes: Missing year effect; substantial residual structure
Good fit; parsimonious; origin effects negligible conditional on weight+year
Heavy tails detected (nu~7) but ELPD gain not significant (z=0.26)

pairwise_comparisons.interpretation: Year effect provides substantial predictive improvement
Student-t provides negligible predictive improvement despite heavy tails

key_findings: Weight elasticity near -1 confirms physical model
Year effect ~3.3% per year captures technological progress
Origin effects negligible conditional on weight+year
Heavy tails present (nu~7) but predictively equivalent to Normal
residual_issues: Diesel vehicles under-predicted (fuel type not modeled)
Rotary engines over-predicted (engine type not modeled)
Slight positive bias in 1980-82 (possible year non-linearity)

recommendations.rationale: Class B will test whether explicit origin terms improve prediction beyond weight+year. Class C hierarchical models unlikely to help with only 3 large groups.
